verses.text: Moreover he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* that thou \w findest|strong="H4672"\w*; \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* this \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
So I \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and he caused me to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* that \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, cause thy \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* thy \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* with this \w roll|strong="H4039"\w* that I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee. Then did I \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add it;\add* and it was in my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* as \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* for \w sweetness|strong="H4966"\w*.

¶ And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w get|strong="H0935"\w* thee unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* with my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto them.

For thou \add art\add* not \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of a \w strange|strong="H6012"\w* \w speech|strong="H8193"\w* and of an \w hard|strong="H3515"\w* \w language|strong="H3956"\w*, \add but\add* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;\f + \fr 3.5 \ft of a…: Heb. deep of lip, and heavy of tongue\f*

Not to \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of a \w strange|strong="H6012"\w* \w speech|strong="H8193"\w* and of an \w hard|strong="H3515"\w* \w language|strong="H3956"\w*, whose \w words|strong="H1697"\w* thou canst not \w understand|strong="H8085"\w*. Surely, had I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thee to them, they would have \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 3.6 \ft of a…: Heb. deep of lip, and heavy of language\f*\f + \fr 3.6 \ft Surely…: or, If I had sent thee, etc. would they not have hearkened unto thee?\f*

But the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H0014"\w* not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto thee; for they \w will|strong="H0014"\w* not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me: for all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add are\add* \w impudent|strong="H2389"\w* and \w hardhearted|strong="H7186"\w*.\f + \fr 3.7 \ft impudent…: Heb. stiff of forehead, and hard of heart\f*

Behold, I have \w made|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w against|strong="H5980"\w* their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*, and thy \w forehead|strong="H4696"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w against|strong="H5980"\w* their \w foreheads|strong="H4696"\w*.

As an \w adamant|strong="H8068"\w* \w harder|strong="H2389"\w* than \w flint|strong="H6864"\w* have I \w made|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w forehead|strong="H4696"\w*: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* them not, neither be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w* at their \w looks|strong="H6440"\w*, though they \add be\add* a \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

Moreover he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, all my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that I shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* with thine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.

And \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w get|strong="H0935"\w* thee to them of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, and \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; whether they will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, or whether they will \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*.

Then the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* took me \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* me a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w rushing|strong="H7494"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* from his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\add I heard\add* also the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of the living \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w* that \w touched|strong="H5401"\w* \w one|strong="H0802"\w* \w another|strong="H0269"\w*, and the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* them, and a \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w rushing|strong="H7494"\w*.\f + \fr 3.13 \ft touched: Heb. kissed\f*

So the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* lifted me \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and took me \w away|strong="H3947"\w*, and I \w went|strong="H3212"\w* in \w bitterness|strong="H4751"\w*, in the \w heat|strong="H2534"\w* of my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*; but the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* upon me.\f + \fr 3.14 \ft in bitterness: Heb. bitter\f*\f + \fr 3.14 \ft heat: Heb. hot anger\f*

¶ Then I \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to them of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w* at \w Tel-abib|strong="H8512"\w*, that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Chebar|strong="H3529"\w*, and I \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* where they \w sat|strong="H3427"\w*, and \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* there \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And it came to pass at the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, I have \w made|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: therefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* at my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and give them \w warning|strong="H2094"\w* from me.

When I \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, Thou shalt \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; and thou givest him not \w warning|strong="H2094"\w*, nor \w speakest|strong="H1696"\w* to \w warn|strong="H2094"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* from his \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, to save his \w life|strong="H2421"\w*; the same \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add man\add* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; but his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* will I \w require|strong="H1245"\w* at thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Yet if thou \w warn|strong="H2094"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, and he \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* not from his \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, nor from his \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, he shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; but thou hast \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Again|strong="H7725"\w*, When a \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add man\add* doth \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, and I \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* a \w stumblingblock|strong="H4383"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, he shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: because thou hast not given him \w warning|strong="H2094"\w*, he shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, and his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* which he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* shall not be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*; but his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* will I \w require|strong="H1245"\w* at thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 3.20 \ft righteousness which: Heb. righteousnesses\f*

Nevertheless if thou \w warn|strong="H2094"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add man\add*, that the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* not, and he doth not \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, because he is \w warned|strong="H2094"\w*; also thou hast \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

¶ And the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was there upon me; and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w plain|strong="H1237"\w*, and I will there \w talk|strong="H1696"\w* with thee.

Then I \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w plain|strong="H1237"\w*: and, behold, the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* there, as the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* which I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Chebar|strong="H3529"\w*: and I \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* on my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

Then the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into me, and \w set|strong="H5975"\w* me upon my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* with me, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Go|strong="H0935"\w*, \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* thyself \w within|strong="H8432"\w* thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

But thou, O \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, behold, they shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w bands|strong="H5688"\w* upon thee, and shall \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* thee with them, and thou shalt not go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them:

And I will make thy \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* to the roof of thy \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w*, that thou shalt be \w dumb|strong="H0481"\w*, and shalt not be to them a \w reprover|strong="H0376"\w*: for they \add are\add* a \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 3.26 \ft a reprover: Heb. a man reproving\f*

But when I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee, I will \w open|strong="H6605"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; He that \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w*, let him \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; and he that \w forbeareth|strong="H2310"\w*, let him \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*: for they \add are\add* a \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
